item.title: Honey Butter BBQ Pork
item.description: Total: 10 minutes Servings: todo Ingredients salt pepper 2x pork chop [[recipes/seasonings/BBQ Seasoning|BBQ Seasoning]] olive oil Steps Pat pork dry with paper towels Season lightly with salt and pepper Rub all over with [[recipes/seasonings/BBQ Seasoning|BBQ Seasoning]] Heat a large drizzle of oil in a large pan over medium-high heat Add pork, cook until browned and cooked through (2-3 minutes per side) source: hello fresh
